text: Aning Israelian tongɨn bar arazir kuram gami, egha aning namakabar amuiba koma akuava, nan ziam gifara akam akuri. Kɨ akar kam me ganɨngizir puvatɨ. Kɨrara, kɨ aning gara aning gɨfogha gɨvagha aningɨn gun mɨgei. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ aning gasɨghasigham. Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ kamaghɨn mɨkemegha gɨfa.”
